17  
18  package org.apache.shardingsphere.test.e2e.agent.common.env;
19  
20  import com.zaxxer.hikari.HikariConfig;
21  import com.zaxxer.hikari.HikariDataSource;
22  import lombok.Getter;
23  import lombok.extern.slf4j.Slf4j;
24  import okhttp3.Response;
25  import org.apache.shardingsphere.test.e2e.agent.common.util.OkHttpUtils;
26  import org.awaitility.Awaitility;
27  import org.awaitility.core.ConditionTimeoutException;
28  
29  import javax.sql.DataSource;
30  import java.io.IOException;
31  import java.sql.Connection;
32  import java.sql.DriverManager;
33  import java.sql.SQLException;
34  import java.sql.Statement;
35  import java.util.Properties;
36  import java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit;
37  import java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicBoolean;
38  
39  @Getter
40  @Slf4j
41  public final class E2ETestEnvironment {
42      
43      private static final E2ETestEnvironment INSTANCE = new E2ETestEnvironment();
44      
45      private final Properties props;
46      
47      private final boolean isEnvironmentPrepared;
48      
49      private DataSource dataSource;
50      
51      private boolean isInitialized;
52      
53      private boolean isAdaptedProxy;
54      
55      private String adapter;
56      
57      private final AtomicBoolean prepareFlag = new AtomicBoolean();
58      
59      private E2ETestEnvironment() {
60          props = EnvironmentProperties.loadProperties("env/engine-env.properties");
61          isEnvironmentPrepared = props.getProperty("it.env.value").equals(props.getProperty("it.env.type"));
62          adapter = props.getProperty("it.env.adapter", "proxy");
63          isAdaptedProxy = "proxy".equalsIgnoreCase(adapter);
64      }
65      
66      /**
67       * Get instance.
68       *
69       * @return singleton instance
70       */
71      public static E2ETestEnvironment getInstance() {
72          return INSTANCE;
73      }
74      
75      /**
76       * Prepare environment.
77       */
78      public void prepareEnvironment() {
79          if (!prepareFlag.compareAndSet(false, true)) {
80              return;
81          }
82          if (isAdaptedProxy()) {
83              createDataSource();
84              isInitialized = null != dataSource;
85          } else {
86              isInitialized = waitForJdbcEnvironmentReady();
87          }
88      }
89      
90      private void createDataSource() {
91          if (isEnvironmentPrepared && null == dataSource) {
92              if (waitForProxyEnvironmentReady(props)) {
93                  dataSource = createHikariCP(props);
94              }
95          }
96      }
97      
98      private boolean waitForProxyEnvironmentReady(final Properties props) {
99          log.info("Proxy with agent environment initializing ...");
100         try {
101             Awaitility.await().atMost(2, TimeUnit.MINUTES).pollInterval(5, TimeUnit.SECONDS).until(() -> isProxyReady(props));
102         } catch (final ConditionTimeoutException ignored) {
103             log.info("Proxy with agent environment initialization failed ...");
104             return false;
105         }
106         log.info("Proxy with agent environment initialized successfully ...");
107         return true;
108     }
109     
110     private boolean isProxyReady(final Properties props) {
111         log.info("Try to connect proxy ...");
112         String url = props.getProperty("proxy.url");
113         String username = props.getProperty("proxy.username", "root");
114         String password = props.getProperty("proxy.password", "root");
115         try (
116                 Connection connection = DriverManager.getConnection(url, username, password);
117                 Statement statement = connection.createStatement()) {
118             statement.execute("SELECT 1");
119         } catch (final SQLException ignored) {
120             return false;
121         }
122         return true;
123     }
124     
125     private DataSource createHikariCP(final Properties props) {
126         HikariConfig result = new HikariConfig();
127         result.setDriverClassName("com.mysql.cj.jdbc.Driver");
128         result.setJdbcUrl(props.getProperty("proxy.url"));
129         result.setUsername(props.getProperty("proxy.username", "root"));
130         result.setPassword(props.getProperty("proxy.password", "root"));
131         result.setMaximumPoolSize(5);
132         result.setTransactionIsolation("TRANSACTION_READ_COMMITTED");
133         return new HikariDataSource(result);
134     }
135     
136     private boolean waitForJdbcEnvironmentReady() {
137         log.info("Jdbc project with agent environment initializing ...");
138         try {
139             Awaitility.await().atMost(2, TimeUnit.MINUTES).pollInterval(5, TimeUnit.SECONDS).until(() -> isJdbcReady(props));
140         } catch (final ConditionTimeoutException ignored) {
141             log.info("Jdbc project with agent environment initialization failed ...");
142             return false;
143         }
144         log.info("Jdbc project with agent environment initialized successfully ...");
145         return true;
146     }
147     
148     private boolean isJdbcReady(final Properties props) {
149         log.info("Try to connect jdbc project ...");
150         String baseUrl = props.getProperty("jdbc.base.url");
151         String selectAllUrl = props.getProperty("jdbc.path.select.all");
152         try {
153             Response response = OkHttpUtils.getInstance().getResponse(String.join("", baseUrl, selectAllUrl));
154             response.close();
155             return response.isSuccessful();
156         } catch (final IOException ignored) {
157         }
158         return false;
159     }
160 }
